Interactive Online Course | Start Date TBD

Elevate Your Career in Ethics and Compliance

12 hours of live sessions with compliance officers from major international companies, compliance interview preparation, resume & LinkedIn optimization, coaching sessions, checklists, Q&A and peer networking.

Get More Details

About the course

Who is this course for

Compliance professionals seeking a career boost

You want to get more interview invites, get your resume and LinkedIn noticed by recruiters, and land interviews for compliance roles in top companies.

Compliance managers who want global opportunities

You’ve already achieved a lot in your current compliance role in your country/company and now want to move your career to another country or to a Fortune 500 company.

Individuals preparing for compliance job interviews

You want to make sure you are well prepared for compliance job interviews, both in terms of technical compliance knowledge and behavioral questions.

Those seeking to properly strategise their compliance careers

You would like to get a promotion as well as understand how to properly strategise your compliance career for the next 5-10 years - whether to stay in your current role/company, to move to another company/place.

Skills Development

What you will learn

Compliance Job Strategy FCPA / Compliance Knowledge Checklist Interview Preparation Job Search Tips First 90 days in a new role Resume Working with Recruiters Certifications and Events Market Fit Assessment LinkedIn Optimization

First, you will get a clear plan on how to evaluate your market fit and what you need to do even before applying for compliance & ethics jobs to increase your chances. You will then understand what are the real expectations that large companies have and how to build a job application system that generates you regular interview invitations.

Then, you will get a lof strategic insights on improving your resume (including making it ATS friendly) and optimizing your LinkedIn page so that LinkedIn Recruitment algorithm starts selecting you as a Top Candidate. Finally, you will get a lof of helpful materials and tips for compliance interviews preparation, effective communications with recruiters and hiring managers, as well as negotiating your offers. Finally, we will discuss what to do in the first 3, 6 and 12 months in your new job.

Course Structure

80% practical knowledge

The program consists of 20% theory and 80% practice. During the theoretical lectures, we will explain how to improve your chances of getting a new compliance job in a simple and clear way. In the practical workshops, you will start working with on this with tools we give you.

The results in 3 months

How the Course works

Video Lectures and Q&As

You’ll participate in 12 structured in-person online sessions, each lasting around 1-1.5 hour, where we will clearly and practically guide you through the step-by-step process of elevating your compliance career (either by growing in your company or getting an external job). Through these lessons, you’ll understand exactly what to do at every stage to secure a job. All lessons are highly visual and designed to be as clear as possible, so you can easily follow along.

Templates, Tools, and Resources

We provide you with all the working templates, guides, and additional materials that will support you in your compliance job search. You won’t waste time figuring things out — you simply take and use what’s already proven to work and deliver results. This approach speeds up your job search by 5 times, helping you achieve your goals faster.

Chat, Reviews and Coaching Sessions

You’ll complete all home assignments, use additional resources, and connect with peers in the chat to support and help each other. This can be also great source of referrals exchange. We’ll also discuss your specific situations and questions during Q&A sessions. For those who have the Advanced Course - we would conduct 2 coaching sessions reviewing your situation and documents.

Reviews

The Course Price

Choose your package

Course Start Date To be announced

We will decide on the dates and launch the course as soon as we have around 25-30 registered participants.

Course Duration 1.5 month (2 sessions per week)
Have any questions? compliance@compliance

Standard

€400

€600 regular price
The price is valid until 1 May 2025
  • Access to all course lectures (during the course plus 6 months after)
  • Compliance Interview Preparation Checklist
  • Access to a private chat with all course participants.
  • Compliance Knowledge Checklist (150 pages document covering minimum knowledge you must have before going to any interview)
  • Review of your resume and LinkedIn page and providing recommendations
  • Checklist for Reviewing Compliance Documents
  • 1 individual coaching session with the course instructors
  • Guide First 90 Days in the New Compliance Role

  • Review of your resume and LinkedIn page and providing recommendations
